document_title: Acute pancreatitis: causes, symptoms, complications and diagnosis
subsection_content:
Symptoms of acute pancreatitis can vary, depending on the cause and severity, but the most common include:
Upper abdominal pain Abdominal pain spreading to the back Fever Rapid pulse Nausea/vomiting Abdominal bloating Poor appetite; Upper abdominal pain; Abdominal pain spreading to the back; Fever; Rapid pulse; Nausea/vomiting; Distention; Eat poorly
